debates.showAs: Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: Second Stage
Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide that information relating to the repairability of certain products be made available and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun go ndéanfar faisnéis a bhaineann le hindeisitheacht táirgí áirithe a chur ar fáil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Information on Repairability of Certain Products Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhaisnéis maidir le hIndeisitheacht Táirgí Áirithe, 2024

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Criminal Justice (Victims of Crime) Act 2017 to permit and encourage courts to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between charge and conviction, and to dismiss charges if appropriate; to encourage courts to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between conviction and sentencing; to permit and encourage An Garda Síochána and the Director of Public Prosecutions to refer cases to restorative justice schemes between charge and court, and to review the decision to prosecute if appropriate; and to make related provisions.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Cheartas Coiriúil (Íospartaigh na Coireachta), 2017 chun a cheadú do chúirteanna, agus chun cúirteanna a spreagadh, cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chúisimh agus tráth an chiontaithe, agus cúisimh a dhíbhe, más cuí; do spreagadh cúirteanna chun cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chiontaithe agus gearradh na pianbhreithe; dá cheadú don Gharda Síochána agus don Stiúrthóir Ionchúiseamh Poiblí, agus dá spreagadh, cásanna a tharchur chuig scéimeanna um cheartas aisig idir tráth an chúisimh agus tráth na cúirte, agus d’athbhreithniú na breithe chun ionchúiseamh a dhéanamh, más cuí; agus do dhéanamh forálacha gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Promotion of Restorative Justice) (Amendment) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ceartas Aisig a Chur chun Cinn) (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: National Vetting Bureau (Children and Vulnerable Persons) (Amendment) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
National Vetting Bureau (Children and Vulnerable Persons) (Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the National Vetting Bureau (Children and Vulnerable Persons) Act 2012 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um an mBiúró Náisiúnta Grinnfhiosrúcháin (Leanaí agus Daoine Soghonta), 2012 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: National Vetting Bureau (Children and Vulnerable Persons) (Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an mBiúró Náisiúnta Grinnfhiosrúcháin (Leanaí agus Daoine Soghonta) (Leasú), 2022

debates.showAs: Employment Equality (Pay Transparency) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Employment Equality (Pay Transparency) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Employment Equality Act 1998 to provide for pay transparency in the advertising of jobs.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le trédhearcacht pá le linn poist a fhógairt.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta (Trédhearcacht Pá), 2022

debates.showAs: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to defamation, in order to allow judgements of defamation be made against the social media platform on which the defamatory utterances were made when the social media platform in question is unable to produce the identity of the person who made the utterances, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le clúmhilleadh, chun go bhféadfar breithiúnais chlúmhillte a thabhairt i gcoinne an ardáin meán sóisialta a ndearnadh an chaint chlúmhillteach air nuair nach mbeidh an t-ardán meán sóisialta a bheidh i gceist in ann céannacht an duine a rinne an chaint a thabhairt ar aird, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Responsibility of Social Media Platforms (Defamation Amendment) Bill 2022
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Fhreagracht Ardán Meán Sóisialta (Leasú ar Dhlí an Chlúmhillte), 2022

debates.showAs: Health (Parliamentary Oversight of Certain Instruments Relating to Covid-19) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Health Act 1947, and for that purpose to provide for parliamentary oversight of regulations made by the Minister for Health under section 31A of that Act and of orders made by that Minister under section 31B of that Act and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Sláinte, 1947, agus, chun na críche sin, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le formhaoirsiú parlaiminteach ar rialacháin arna ndéanamh ag an Aire Sláinte faoi alt 31A den Acht sin agus ar orduithe arna ndéanamh ag an Aire sin faoi alt 31B den Acht sin agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Health (Parliamentary Oversight of Certain Instruments Relating to Covid-19) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Sláinte (Formhaoirsiú Parlaiminteach ar Ionstraimí Áirithe a Bhaineann le Covid-19), 2021
